text: Bheemavaram is a village in Khammam district of the Indian state of Telangana. It is located in Yerrupalem mandal of Khammam revenue division. == Geography == Bheemavaram is located at and at an altitude of . The village is spread over an area of . == References == Category:Villages in Khammam district
title: Bheemavaram, Khammam district
